entry.title: Our sis and community warrior is being targeted! Please like,...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Our sis and community warrior is being targeted! Please like, comment, share and donate to LadySpeech 🖤
Links in comments

Bianca Mikahn is with Yolanda Begay-Reichhardt and 11 others.

ACTIVATION NEEDED! Please copy & paste, get word everywhere. I never tag folks but this is key

The sistren LadySpeech is being unfairly targeted for speaking tr...uth and light for our community. Her IG following has been completely ERASED after she built it to over 20,000 active followers. She has been placed in FB jail with NO WARNING for 30 days. All without any word before or during. I looked after she told me. Its devastating. She made so much content, had such amazing conversations and connections happening there. Go to her IG now? "No Posts Yet"

Because she works for community. For sex workers. For rachet hood girls. BECAUSE SHE STARED THAT SMUDGING THE COPS BIT. Because she is effective.

Being an activist/actionist/advocate is literally the only source of income for Speech. She serves directly without support of any organization. Her readings (get one!), videos and performances (which of course are on pause) support her endless quest for advanced spiritual practices and insights.

In a world maddened by Blackness, by fatness, by survivors Lady Speech glows and grinds endlessly. Her whole life is on this work. Her outspokenness around dismantling systems of oppression harming Black/Fat/MaGes is specifically why she is experiencing this direct attack.

Ensure Speech's work is able to continue by paying her directly. And often.

Your most valuable community leaders are under specific attack.
SHOW.UP.

CashApp; $LadySpeech
Venmo; @Ladyspeech-Sankofa

See More

entry.title: Many many thanks from these two and all of us at #BLM5280 to...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many many thanks from these two and all of us at #BLM5280 to everyone who has donated to support them through their troublesome time! Black mothers with disabilities have almost no safety nets in our current system! When we say #defundthepolice we mean take those billions wasted on mortal combat gear and funnel them back into programs that should be keeping this family afloat. Until that happens we have to continue to show up for each other. It’s #Disabilityawarenessmonth. Show your support in #mutualaid and #reparations. #Blackmamasmatter
cash app: $shynethegoddezz

(Flyer in comments for sharing to raise awareness!)

entry.title: #ENDSARS #ENDSARSNOW #BLACKLIVESMATTER
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#ENDSARS #ENDSARSNOW #BLACKLIVESMATTER

Black Lives Matter Philly

BLACK LIVES MATTER PHILLY STATEMENT OF SOLIDARITY WITH THE #EndSARS MOVEMENT IN NIGERIA AGAINST POLICE BRUTALITY

At Black Lives Matter Philly, we affirm that Al...l Black Lives Matter EVERYWHERE. We stand in solidarity with our family in Nigeria and the #EndSARS movement against police brutality. We fully support the #EndSARS demands for the complete abolition of the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS) unit of the Nigerian Police Force and an end to all forms of state violence against Nigerian people:

Read our full statement below and at our website: http://www.blmphilly.com/…/statement-of-solidarity-with-th…/

See More

entry.title: We are so close to our goal, y'all! Please ❤️ ,...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

We are so close to our goal, y'all! Please ❤️ , comment, and share this post because you already know these algorithms won't let us be great! #BlackEducatorsMatter #CallToAction #BlackLivesMatter #Reparations #MutualAid

Black Lives Matter 5280

#CTA #Calltoaction Black afternoon fam and friends! Don't know about y'all, but we are still in our feelings about the lack of Black nominees for #ColoradoTeach...eroftheYear. From your shout outs we put together a list of 32 Black educators in Denver and Aurora that deserve all the props for their #Blackeducatorexcellence! We're excited to share that BLM5280 is pledging to honor their general dopeness with a $50 award to each nominee BUT if we can get 160 of y’all to give just $10 we can double that and send each educator $100! Send your contribution at the link below and be sure to label it ‘#BlackEducatorsMatter’.

www.venmo.com/BLM5280

Like, share, and comment 'done!' so this post doesn't get buried! ✊🏿✊🏿✊🏿

See More

entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Alliance for Street Health ResponseFor the next two weeks, we will be co-hosting a series of workshops to...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Alliance for Street Health Response

For the next two weeks, we will be co-hosting a series of workshops to build infrastructure and community support in preparation for what may happen during and ...after election day. We join Colorado Jobs with Justice/Trabajos con Justicia and community partners Denver Action Medic Network and National Lawyers Guild of Colorado for these events. Join us on October 21 for a Protest Safety and First Aid workshop: https://fb.me/e/4L16rNdfB

entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom SchoolOlivia, a current Moonshot fellow, is hosting a Moonshot pilot centered on the use of joy and...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom School

Olivia, a current Moonshot fellow, is hosting a Moonshot pilot centered on the use of joy and healing to disrupt systems. It is a co-creation session of listeni...ng, reflecting, and imagining for how joy shows up in our lives and how it could. This is specifically centered on BIPoC youth (ages 12-18) and the demands of how/what is needed to thrive and have joy. Register your child here: https://docs.google.com/…/1FAIpQLSdSj_hvwzGBYjE--W…/viewform

See More

entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Marz ChandlerMy sister is in need of community. I believe we all have it in us to come together to help her. The...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280Marz Chandler

My sister is in need of community. I believe we all have it in us to come together to help her. The system doesn’t care about a Black woman who is unable to wor...k due to a recently diagnosed chronic illness, or the son she is raising and needs to shelter & feed. Shyne needs our support while she recovers. Anything helps 🙏🏽 $shynethegoddezz

entry.title: This weekend, BLM5280 held our Fall Strategic Planning Retreat...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

This weekend, BLM5280 held our Fall Strategic Planning Retreat and we are so excited for all that we are getting ready to bring to the community. Sending gratitude to the 7 (yes, 7!!) Black-owned businesses (6 Black-Woman-Owned!!!) who supported our retreat and gave us the opportunity to support their amazing work.
Thank you to Konjo Ethiopian Food; Urban Sanctuary Denver; Neha of Transformative Leadership for Change; the incredible Hues of Hendrix; Nola Voodoo Tavern; Whittier Cafe, Your Real Estate BFF Millete Birhanemaskel; and Jalisa Williams of Soulflower Yoga for all that you do for community and all that you brought to our retreat.
Forward Together,
BLM5280 🖤

entry.title: “The general strike is the most powerful tool the working...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“The general strike is the most powerful tool the working class has to win political change. With Trump now openly talking about stealing the November election, unions are beginning to talk about a general strike to stop a coup, and defeat the rising tide of fascism here in the US.

But what is a general strike? How do they happen? What can you do to start organizing your coworkers now for mass action? Join our General Strike School this Halloween to find out and get plugged into an organizing network!”

https://fb.me/e/35D71dbLz

SAT, OCT 31 AT 2:00 PM MDT

General Strike School!

Online EventCauses · 124 people

entry.title: “Race and Homelessness Vigil 5256 Minutes for Every Black...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“Race and Homelessness Vigil
5256 Minutes for Every Black Indigenous and Person of Color Who is Homeless in Denver
Starting on Wednesday October 14th at 7am we will be holding space in front of City Hall for 5256 minutes (equaling 89 hours) ending October 17th at 10pm. This is to honor and stand for every BIPOC who is homeless in Denver right now.
There were 1752 BIPOC people counted homeless in Denver in January 2020. This is a known undercount. To honor everyone, not just ...

Continue Reading

WED, OCT 14

Race and Homelessnes Vigil

denver city and county buildingCauses · 207 people

entry.title: #DEMANDS...
entry.content:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

entry.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
entry.content:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org

Black Lives Matter 5280
